item.title: Teggy finally steps up to the plate
item.description: <p>A stormy Silvermere golf course pushed the players to theirs limits. Thunder and lighting and a late blitz by Teggy saw him take his first title in the Race to ciao bella</p>

item.title: WAGA on tour
item.description: <p>Tom Apperley takes the branding to Northants and the carefully selected teams wins morning scrambles. A woodman preferred format with spectacular score of 8 under</p>

item.title: Foister hot streak continues
item.description: <p>Rich Foister continues to dominate the Race To Ciao Bella with yet another strong performance on the unknown Hampton Court golf course. Well done to Brad for his sub 100</p>

item.title: Foister sneaks to Triple crown on countback
item.description: <p>On a delightful afternoon in Chertsey, Foxhills GC hosted the Twilight Cup. Rich pipped Brad to the victory with a confidently drained putt on 18. This is the third victory on the trot for Foist. Can he be stopped?</p>

item.title: Foister claims Febex win
item.description: <p>Richard Foister emphatically claims his second tour event in a row on a crisp afternoon in South Croydon. Tom Apperley currently leads the Race To Ciao Bella having completed three rounds. Check out thewaga.com for the latest leaderboards</p>

item.title: Apperley storms to victory
item.description: <p>Congratulations to Tom Apperley on winning the inaugral Stableford and Wine invitational</p>

item.title: Welcome to the home of the WAGA
item.description: <p>After a welcome Xmas break, the WAGA has been hard at work to bring you the latest news and tournaments updates from across the world</p>

item.title: AAI
item.description: <p>The Tom Apperley Autumn Invitational at the Addington was cermoniously won by Richard foister. Congratulations on winning the very first Race To Ciao Bella event. A truly prestigious moment in your WAGA tour career.</p>
